ygData.subject: Re: Bardic guild on Tunare
ygData.msgSnippet: I almost am always grouped with members of my guild.  Last night we had a six member group entirely from my guild - but usually its 3-or-4 - often augmented by
ygData.messageBody:
I almost am always grouped with members of my guild. Last night we had a
six member group entirely from my guild - but usually its 3-or-4 - often
augmented by friends or "pick-ups"...

Maybe Xegony is different - but I think I USUALLY see the same guild tag on
more than one person when I'm in a pick-up group - or watch other groups..

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: RaceFace <bean@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 1999 2:51 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bardic guild on Tunare


>
> I rarely see groups of people all of the same guild adventuring together,
> unless they're all 30+ and camping something. I don't only think of
guilds
> as being groups of like-minded people, and such. Why not have a guild
that
> is class specific?
>
